projects.title: Dream House
projects.description: A modern, responsive portfolio landing page for a construction/renovation company. This project demonstrates front-end development and UI skills from design mockup to fully functional, production-ready website.

projects.title: Waxom
projects.description: Pure CSS elements demonstration without using JavaScript. Used for Workshop.

projects.title: Antibuks
projects.description: New design for the site antibuks.com.ua. Create site from scratch including photoshop design, HTML/CSS, JS, responsive web design.

projects.title: inlineskatecourse.com
projects.description: Front-End for inlineskatecourse.com in cooperation with Denis Kliatskii. The project is responsive for all dimensions and orientations of mobile devices. Front-End is now live, using WordPress.

projects.title: Kauf
projects.description: 2 languages website. Has 3 sliders, 2 of them with video. Creating website layout from PSD to HTML5 semantic markup, JS interaction and CSS3 stylisation, responsive UI design, optimization of page loading.

projects.title: SevenOaks
projects.description: Responsive landing page with fullpage slider. Built as test task for one of the computer companies. Only pure CSS, HTML and jQuery were used. No plugins. Built on Gulp with SASS preprocessor.

projects.title: Motorcycle expedition company
projects.description: Creating website layout from PSD to HTML5 semantic markup, JS interaction and CSS3 stylisation, responsive UI design.

projects.title: Pink
projects.description: Multipage full responsive application design, available from tablet, mobile and desktop. Team-leading with Git creating layout in a team.

projects.description: Creating website layout on HTML5 semantic from PSD, CSS3 stylisation, responsive UI design.
